venue.name: The Alchemy Juice Bar & Growing Green Co-op

item.description:
Please join us to see Genetic Roulette: The Documented Health Risks of Genetically Engineered Foods. We will also be having a Letter Writing Party to write personal letters to our legislators to tell them we want labeling for GMO's!

This seminal documentary provides compelling evidence to help explain the deteriorating health of Americans, especially among children, and offers a recipe for protecting ourselves and our future. Join us to watch this film and discuss one of the most important issues of our time. Leaders of GMO Free Hartford/CT will be there for a discussion and answer any questions you may have following the movie.
item.name: Genetic Roulette Movie Screening and Letter Writing Party
